# SubscriptionCancelResponse

**Object**

The response body for a successful subscription cancellation.

## Declaration

```swift
object SubscriptionCancelResponse
```

## Discussion

This is the response body for the [doc://com.apple.advancedcommerceapi/documentation/AdvancedCommerceAPI/Cancel-a-Subscription] endpoint.

## Subscription cancellation from the server

- **Cancel a Subscription**: Turn off automatic renewal to cancel a customer’s auto-renewable subscription.
- **SubscriptionCancelRequest**: The request body for turning off automatic renewal of a subscription.

items.description: Turn off automatic renewal to cancel a customer’s auto-renewable subscription.
